document_data.name: Healer's Kit
document_data.mainbody: A '''healer's kit''', also known as a '''healer's bag''', was a set of of equipment used by medics to treat the injured.
document_data.Description:
[[File:HealersKitUsage.png|thumb|270px|''An [[elf]] healer using the contents of a healer's kit on a wounded man.'']]
The contents of these kits were kept in [[leather]] [[pouch]]es. The contents themselves were splints, ointments, balms, and dressings. Healers' kits could stabilize those who had fallen in battle, though the kits could only be used ten times, as their contents were limited. Skilled physicians were able to make even greater uses of such kits, restoring the fallen so that they could fight again, and restoring their health even if they had not fallen.
document_data.Availability:
* In [[Athkatla]], one could find healer's bags for sale in the market [[Waukeen's Promenade]].<ref><ref group="note" name="Duty">''[[For Duty & Deity]]'' states that every nonmagical item featured in the ''[[Arms and Equipment Guide]]'' can be purchased at Waukeen's Promenade.
* In [[Zhentil Keep]], one could find healer's bags for sale at [[Lita's Equipment]].<ref><ref group="note" name="Lita">''[[Ruins of Zhentil Keep]]'' states that everything from the ''Arms and Equipment Guide'', except for arms and armor, can be purchased at Lita's Equipment.
